languages.text: This creature has -1 AP. Also, at the start of its turn, it receives moderate Mental damage. Successful WIL Save (-10) reduces the damage.

traits.locale_text: This creature has -1 AP. Also, at the start of its turn, it receives moderate Mental damage. Successful WIL Save (-10) reduces the damage.

languages.text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: The character's AP are reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. A successful Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty reduces that damage.

languages.text: ОД персонажа уменьшаются на 1. В начале своего хода персонаж получает средний психический урон, который уменьшается при успешном прохождении проверки Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −10.
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: ОД персонажа уменьшаются на 1. В начале своего хода персонаж получает средний психический урон, который уменьшается при успешном прохождении проверки Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −10.
ОД персонажа уменьшаются на 1. В начале своего хода персонаж получает средний психический урон, который уменьшается при успешном прохождении проверки Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −10.

languages.text: Los PA del personaje se reducen en −1. Al principio de su turno, el personaje sufre una cantidad moderada de daño mental. Si este personaje supera una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −10, ese daño se reduce.
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: Los PA del personaje se reducen en −1. Al principio de su turno, el personaje sufre una cantidad moderada de daño mental. Si este personaje supera una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −10, ese daño se reduce.

languages.text: そのキャラクターのAPは-1される。ターン開始時、そのキャラクターは中程度の精神的ダメージを受ける。このキャラクターが-10のペナルティを伴う意志力抵抗判定に合格した場合、そのダメージは軽減される。
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: そのキャラクターのAPは-1される。ターン開始時、そのキャラクターは中程度の精神的ダメージを受ける。このキャラクターが-10のペナルティを伴う意志力抵抗判定に合格した場合、そのダメージは軽減される。

languages.text: 此角色的行动点数降低1点。回合开始时，此角色会受到中等程度的精神伤害。此角色需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-10减值，若能通过检定，则受到的精神伤害降低。
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: 此角色的行动点数降低1点。回合开始时，此角色会受到中等程度的精神伤害。此角色需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-10减值，若能通过检定，则受到的精神伤害降低。

languages.text: Die AP des Charakters werden um -1 reduziert. Zu Beginn seines Zuges erleidet der Charakter moderaten Mentalschaden. Gelingt diesem Charakter eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -10, wird dieser Schaden reduziert.
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: Die AP des Charakters werden um -1 reduziert. Zu Beginn seines Zuges erleidet der Charakter moderaten Mentalschaden. Gelingt diesem Charakter eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -10, wird dieser Schaden reduziert.

languages.text: Les PA du personnage sont réduits de -1. Au début de son tour, le personnage subit une quantité modérée de dégâts mentaux, qui peut être réduite s'il réussit un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de -10.
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.

traits.locale_text: Les PA du personnage sont réduits de -1. Au début de son tour, le personnage subit une quantité modérée de dégâts mentaux, qui peut être réduite s'il réussit un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de -10.

Les PA du personnage sont réduits de -1. Au début de son tour, le personnage subit une quantité modérée de dégâts mentaux, qui peut être réduite s'il réussit un test de résistance de Volonté avec une pénalité de -10.

languages.text: Karakterin EP'si 1 puan azalır. Karakter, turu başladığında orta derecede zihinsel hasara maruz kalır. Bu karakter, −10 ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçerse hasar azalır.
languages.original_text: The character's AP is reduced by −1. At the start of their turn, the character suffers a moderate amount of mental damage. If this character passes a Willpower resistance test with a −10 penalty, that damage will be reduced.
